Instruction: Wash and trim the celery stalks, then cut them into 2-inch pieces.'
In a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat.'
Add minced garlic to the skillet and saute for 1-2 minutes, until fragrant.'
'Pour chicken or vegetable broth over the celery.'
Cover and simmer for 10-15 minutes, or until celery is tender.'
'Remove the lid and sprinkle grated Parmesan cheese over the celery.'
Continue to cook uncovered for 2-3 minutes, allowing the cheese to melt and the sauce to thicken.'
